About Notebook

XeBook is a text editing mobile application, developed to address the need of taking note of specific events at ease

 Developer   Ezekwe Johnbosco

 Version   1.0

Instructions

Creating a new Book:
 Create a new notebook by clicking on the new note icon
Opening a Book:
 Open a note by clicking on the open note icon, and selecting the note you want to open from the list
Others:
 You can share a note or send the note to others by opening a note an on the options menu select share
